name: The Murder Of Alex Filian (Beta 0.4)
description:
"The Murder Of Alex Filian" is a story driven murder mystery set in 1930s England. 

The game is currently still in Beta so if you would kindly fill out the form provided it would go a long way to help improve the game:

https://forms.gle/Kp4Shz2x5odn9za99

I hope you enjoy the experience, happy sleuthing!
